question: 心配事
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>action</kanji>s and <kanji>things</kanji> you have to <ja>心配</ja> about are your <vocabulary>cares</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>worries</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the reading of <ja>心配</ja> (which you've hopefully gotten down okay by now) and <ja>事</ja> using the (<ja>こと</ja>) reading. It is rendaku'd, as well, so beware of the <ja>ごと</ja> (just another <ja>心配事</ja>, ammiright?).
